subject: Customs clearance documents
description_text:
Hello!

I think my order just got stopped for customs scan and since it's more than
150â‚¬ I'll have to send documents and pay taxes. In your website FAQ it says
to request the documents when this happens. I would like to have them now,
so I have them ready when they request.

Thank you,
Rui Martins

conversations.body_text: Hi Rui Martins,    Here is your invoice information. We apologize for the delay.
